name: Asset Transmission
desc: Describes the process of transmitting an asset from and to an specific actor. The process involves delivering metadata, crypto transactions and statistics.

steps.title: Device A. Process Start
steps.desc: User selects Transmission operation to execute. Valids are: Asset Transfer \b Asset Redemption \b Asset Distribution.
steps.name: asset user

steps.title: Device A. Creation of Transaction
steps.desc: New Business Transaction is created in Asset Transmission

steps.title: Device A. Contract Creation
steps.desc: New Contract is created defining Digital Asset Properties.

steps.title: Device A. Transaction Timeout definition
steps.desc: Time out agent is subscribed to start monitoring elapsed time and rollback if time limit is reached..

steps.title: Device A. Asset blocking
steps.desc: The asset is blocked so more operations are permitted for this asset.

steps.title: Device A. Sends Asset Metadata
steps.desc: An Outgoing Asset Metadata is prepared to be send to the corresponding actor.

steps.title: Device A. Delivers Metadata on P2P
steps.desc: We send the metadata over the network. NS retries are defined in the contract of this transaction.
steps.name: asset transmission

steps.title: Device A. Statistics are stored.
steps.desc: Initial Asset Transmission statistics are stored with asset and actor information.

steps.title: Device B. Receives metadata from P2P
steps.desc: New metadata is received by NS and event trigger to notify upper layers.
steps.name: asset transmission

steps.title: Device B. Incoming Metadata detected
steps.desc: We received the send metadata and is locally stored. New local contract will be stored.

steps.title: Device B. New contract is created.
steps.desc: The received metadata is stored as a new contract.

steps.title: Device B. Contract is validated.
steps.desc: The contract properties are validated to confirm if we are ok to receive the new asset or not..
steps.name: asset factory

steps.title: Process Interrupted
steps.desc: A validation did not pass, or error was thrown. We rollback the process and Asset is again editable.
steps.name: asset issuing

name: Crypto Broker Reference Wallet Installation
desc: Wallet Store installation procedure for the Crypto Broker Reference Wallet

steps.title: User selects the Broker Wallet on the Wallet Store
steps.desc: The user enters the Wallet Store and selects the Crypto Broker Reference Wallet to install it
steps.name: wallet store

steps.title: Wallet Store invokes the Wallet Manager Middleware Plugin
steps.desc: Notifies the Wallet Manager Middleware Plugin so it can install the Wallet
steps.name: wallet store

steps.title: Wallet Manager Middleware Plugin processes installation request
steps.desc: Sends a request to the Wallet Resources Network Service, to gather the resources of the Reference Wallet to be installed
steps.name: wallet manager

steps.title: Wallet Resources Network Service downloads wallet's resources
steps.desc: Downloads the Crypto Broker Reference Wallet's resources, from the GitHub repository
steps.name: wallet resources

steps.title: Processing of the Wallet's Navigation Structure
steps.desc: Processes the Navigation Structure of the Reference Wallet and fires an event which effectively registers the Reference Wallet
steps.name: wallet runtime

steps.title: Setting the Crypto Broker Reference Wallet as Installed
steps.desc: Sets the Crypto Broker Reference Wallet as installed, and fires an event
steps.name: wallet manager

steps.title: Sub App Manager requests resources for the Wallet's Sub Apps
steps.desc: Sends a request to the Sub App Resources Network Service so it can download the necessary resources (Crypto Broker Identity and Crypto Customer Community Sub Apps)

steps.title: Sub App Resources Network Service downloads Sub App's resources
steps.desc: Downloads resources for Crypto Broker Identity and Crypto Customer Community Sub Apps

steps.title: Sub App Runtime parses the Navigation Structure and activates the Sub Apps
steps.desc: Processes the Navigation Structure of the Crypto Broker Identity and Crypto Customer Community Sub Apps and fires a event to activate them

steps.title: Setting the Sub Apps as Installed
steps.desc: The Sub App Manager Middleware sets the Sub Apps as Installed

steps.title: Wallet Manager Middleware Plugin processes installation request
steps.desc: Sends a request to the Wallet Resources Network Service, to gather the resources of the Reference Wallet to be installed

steps.title: Wallet Resources Network Service downloads wallet's resources
steps.desc: Downloads the Crypto Customer Reference Wallet's resources, from the GitHub repository
steps.name: wallet resources

steps.title: Processing of the Wallet's Navigation Structure
steps.desc: Processes the Navigation Structure of the Reference Wallet and fires an event which effectively registers this
steps.name: wallet runtime

steps.title: Setting the Crypto Customer Reference Wallet as Installed
steps.desc: Sets the Crypto Customer Reference Wallet as installed, and fires an event
steps.name: wallet manager

steps.title: Sub App Manager requests resources for the Wallet's Sub Apps
steps.desc: Sends a request to the Sub App Resources Network Service so it can download the necessary resources (Crypto Customer Identity and Crypto Customer Community Sub Apps)

name: Publishing the Crypto Broker Identity
desc: The Broker publishes his Identity, making it visible to the Fermat Network

steps.title: Broker selects an Identity and selects 'Publish'
steps.desc: The Broker selects one of his associated identities and publishes it. This requests the wallet module to change the state of this identity to Public
steps.name: crypto broker identity

steps.title: Forward the request to the actor in order to publish the identity
steps.desc: The Crypto Broker Identity Sub App Module forwards this request to the Crypto Broker Actor
steps.name: crypto broker identity

steps.title: Changes the status of the Identity to Public
steps.desc: The Crypto Broker Actor modifies the status of the Identity to Public
steps.name: crypto broker

steps.title: Commits status change in database
steps.desc: The Crypto Broker Identity Plugin changes its database to reflect the new Public status of the selected Identity
steps.name: crypto broker

steps.title: Sends the Identity to the Actor Network Service
steps.desc: The Crypto Broker Actor Plugin sends the Identity's Information to the Actor Network Service
steps.name: crypto broker

steps.title: Consults the details of the identity to publish
steps.desc: The Crypto Broker Actor Network Seervice consults the details of the identity to publish and finally sends it to the Fermat Network
steps.name: crypto broker

name: Customer requests a connection to a Broker
desc: A Crypto Customer sends a connection request to a Crypto Broker, in order to be able to see his products and start a negotiation

steps.title: Broker selection and request submission
steps.desc: The Customer selects a Broker from the list of Brokers, and submits the request to make a connection
steps.name: crypto broker community

steps.title: Route request to Network Service
steps.desc: The module routes this request to the Network Service so that it reaches the selected Broker
steps.name: crypto broker community

steps.title: Call the Broker to deliver the request
steps.desc: The network service places a call to the broker, delivering the request via the Fermat Network.
steps.name: crypto broker

steps.title: Routing of the Customer's request through the network
steps.desc: The request is then transported through the communication layer, using one of the available channels

steps.title: Request reception on the Broker's side
steps.desc: The Network Service receives the request and informs the Crypto Broker Actor
steps.name: crypto broker

steps.title: Request recording and notification
steps.desc: The request is saved and a notification to the Broker is generated
steps.name: crypto broker

steps.title: Records the notification
steps.desc: The the notification is saved, and the OS core library is notified.
steps.name: notification

steps.title: Sends notification to the OS
steps.desc: The notification manager displays the notification to the OS, notifying the Broker of the connection request

name: Broker accepts a connection from a Customer
desc: A Crypto Broker accepts a connection request send by a Crypto Customer

steps.title: Request list of Crypto Customers waiting for connection
steps.desc: The Broker requests a list of Crypto Customers waiting to connect to him
steps.name: crypto customer community

steps.title: Forward request of list of Crypto Customers waiting for connection
steps.desc: The module routes this request to the Actor Plugin to get the list
steps.name: crypto customer community

steps.title: Returns list of Crypto Customers waiting for connection
steps.desc: Plugin consults its database to get the Crypto Customers waiting for connection
steps.name: crypto broker

steps.title: Return the list of Crypto Customers waiting for connection
steps.desc: The module returns the list of Crypto Customers waiting for connection
steps.name: crypto customer community

steps.title: Customer selection from returned Customer list
steps.desc: Shows the Broker the list of Crypto Customers waiting for connection so that he can select one to accept
steps.name: crypto customer community

steps.title: Register the acceptance of the connection
steps.desc: The Crypto Customer Community Module routes this request to the Actor so it can register the new connection
steps.name: crypto customer community

steps.title: Register the new connection in database
steps.desc: Changes in database the state of the connection to Accepted, while also notifying the Network Service to forward the change to the Crypto Customer
steps.name: crypto broker

steps.title: Sends the message of the accepted connection to the Crypto Customer
steps.desc: Forwards the change of state to the Crypto Customer's device, that the connection request has been accepted
steps.name: crypto customer

steps.title: Receives the accepted changed state
steps.desc: Receives the state change of the acceptance of the connection by the Broker, while also sending an event to the OS
steps.name: crypto customer

steps.title: Sends notification to the OS
steps.desc: Sends the notification to the OS, to notify the Customer of the state change

name: Add New Account
desc: A customer registers a new bank account in the wallet.

steps.title: inputs account registration
steps.desc: inputs account, currency and account type.

steps.title: sends registration request
steps.desc: sends data to the wallet plugin to registrate the account.

steps.title: registers account
steps.desc: registers account: account, currency and account type
steps.name: bank money

name: Deposit
desc: A User Deposits a certain amount on a specific account.

steps.title: request deposit transaction
steps.desc: inputs amount and selects account.

steps.title: sends deposit request
steps.desc: sends data to the deposit plugin to make the transaction.
steps.name: bank money

steps.title: registers deposit transaction and sends credits to the wallet.
steps.desc: registers the transaction and send credits on the available and book balance of the account
steps.name: deposit

steps.title: register credit on the wallet
steps.desc: makes credit on the balances of the account.
steps.name: bank money

name: Withdraw
desc: A User Withdraws a certain amount on a specific account.

steps.title: request withdraw transaction
steps.desc: inputs amount and selects account.

steps.title: sends withdraw request
steps.desc: sends data to the withdraw plugin to make the transaction.
steps.name: bank money

steps.title: registers withdraw transaction and sends debits to the wallet.
steps.desc: registers the transaction and validates that the selected account has enough money and send debits to the available and book balance of the account
steps.name: withdraw

steps.title: register credit on the wallet
steps.desc: makes credit on the balances of the account.
steps.name: bank money

name: Balance Inquiry
desc: returns the current available and book balance of an account.

steps.title: balance inquiry
steps.desc: requests book and available balance of an account

steps.title: sends balance request
steps.desc: sends balance request to the wallet plugin
steps.name: bank money

steps.title: returns balance of the account
steps.desc: return balance of the account.
steps.name: bank money

name: Transaction History
desc: returns the transaction history of an account.

steps.title: transaction history request
steps.desc: requests list of transactions account

steps.title: sends transaction history request
steps.desc: sends balance request to the wallet plugin
steps.name: bank money

steps.title: returns transaction history
steps.desc: returns transaction history sorted by date (from most recent to older).
steps.name: bank money

name: Hold
desc: Holds a certain amount of money in the bank account

steps.title: request Hold
steps.desc: request a hold of the funds in an account

steps.title: process hold transaction request
steps.desc: registers and sends holds funds on the available balance of the account
steps.name: hold

steps.title: makes hold
steps.desc: processes the hold request by making a debit in the account.
steps.name: bank money

name: Unhold
desc: Unholds funds from an account that were previusly held by the hold transaction

steps.title: request unhold
steps.desc: request an unhold of the funds in an account

steps.title: process hold transaction request
steps.desc: registers, validates that has enough funds held, and sends unhold funds on the available balance of the account
steps.name: unhold

steps.title: makes unhhold
steps.desc: processes the unhold request by summing all the amount of the hold transactions previusly made in the account, then makes the credit.
steps.name: bank money

name: Balance Inquiry
desc: Returns the current Available and Book balances of the Cash Wallet

steps.title: Balance inquiry
steps.desc: Requests both Book and Available balances of the wallet

steps.title: Sends balance request
steps.desc: Sends balance request to the Wallet plugin
steps.name: cash money

steps.title: Fetches and returns balances
steps.desc: Consults database for current balances of the cash wallet
steps.name: cash money

name: Transaction History
desc: Returns the transaction history (Only deposits and withdrawals) of the cash wallet

steps.title: Transaction history inquiry
steps.desc: Requests list of transactions

steps.title: Sends transaction history request to cash wallet
steps.desc: Sends balance request to the cash wallet plugin
steps.name: cash money

steps.title: Retches and returns transaction history
steps.desc: Returns transaction history sorted by date DESC
steps.name: cash money

name: Deposit
desc: A Fermat user deposits cash money on his Cash Money Reference Wallet

steps.title: User requests deposit transaction
steps.desc: User enters amount and memo

steps.title: Sends deposit request
steps.desc: Sends deposit data to the deposit plugin to make the transaction
steps.name: cash money

steps.title: Registers deposit transaction and sends credits to the wallet.
steps.desc: Tries to register a credit on the Available and Book balances of the wallet and, if succeded, registers the transaction internally
steps.name: deposit

steps.title: Register credit on the Available and Book balances of the wallet
steps.desc: Applies a credit on the Available and Book balances of the wallet
steps.name: cash money

name: Withdrawal
desc: A Fermat user whithdraws cash money from his Cash Money Reference Wallet

steps.title: User requests withdrawal transaction
steps.desc: User enters amount and memo

steps.title: Sends withdrawal request
steps.desc: Sends withdrawal data to the withdrawal plugin to make the transaction
steps.name: cash money

steps.title: Registers withdrawal transaction and sends debit to the wallet.
steps.desc: Tries to register a debit on the Available and Book balances of the wallet and, if succeded, registers the transaction internally
steps.name: withdrawal

steps.title: Register debit on the Available and Book balances of the wallet
steps.desc: Applies a debit on the Available and Book balances of the wallet
steps.name: cash money

name: Hold
desc: Holds (decrements available balance) an amount of cash money from the cash wallet

steps.title: External plugin requests a hold of the funds from the cash wallet
steps.desc: For this, it sends a transaction UUID, an amount, a memo, and its own public key

steps.title: Receives hold transaction request
steps.desc: Registers hold transaction internally as an ACKNOWLEDGED transaction
steps.name: hold

steps.title: Internal agent processes hold transaction request
steps.desc: Tries to hold funds in wallet, if succeded, changes internal status to CONFIRMED, otherwise REJECTED
steps.name: hold

steps.title: Tries to hold available funds
steps.desc: Processes the hold request by making a debit on the available balance of the cash wallet
steps.name: cash money

name: Unhold
desc: Unholds (increments available balance) an amount of cash money from the cash wallet

steps.title: External plugin requests am unhold of the funds from the cash wallet
steps.desc: For this, it sends a transaction UUID, an amount, a memo, and its own public key

steps.title: Receives unhold transaction request
steps.desc: Registers unhold transaction internally as an ACKNOWLEDGED transaction
steps.name: unhold

steps.title: Internal agent processes unhold transaction request
steps.desc: Tries to unhold funds in wallet, if succeded, changes internal status to CONFIRMED, otherwise REJECTED
steps.name: unhold

steps.title: Tries to unhold available funds
steps.desc: Processes the unhold request by making a debit on the available balance of the cash wallet
steps.name: cash money

name: Send Crypto to Intra user
desc: A Wallet's Intra User sends a crypto to another intra user contact for a specific amount.

steps.title: Select Intra User contact and send crypto
steps.desc: The customer selects a contact from the list and press send button, then complete Send forms and confirms the operation.

steps.title: Route send crypto to outgoing intra user plugin
steps.desc: The module sends it to the outgoing intra user plugin to create the crypto transaction.
steps.name: crypto wallet

steps.title: Route send crypto metadata to network service
steps.desc: The outgoing intra user plugin routes this crypto transaction to the crypto transmission network service to send metadata.
steps.name: outgoing intra actor

steps.title: Route send crypto to Crypto Bitcoin Vault
steps.desc: The outgoing intra user plugin routes this crypto transaction to the Crypto Bitcoin Vault to send btc to another actor and debit amount to Available Balance.
steps.name: outgoing intra actor

steps.title: Send the crypto metadata
steps.desc: The network service sends the crypto metadata and informs that to Incoming Intra User Plugin.
steps.name: crypto transmission

steps.title: Transport request
steps.desc: The send metadata is transported through the communication layer and one of the available channels.

steps.title: Receive the crypto metadata
steps.desc: The network service receives the crypto metadata and informs that to Incoming Intra User Plugin.
steps.name: crypto transmission

steps.title: Call the incoming intra user plugin to deliver the sends bitcoins
steps.desc: The crypto network bitcoin places a call to the incoming intra user plugin and then it delivers the sends crypto.

steps.title: List Received Transaction
steps.desc: The wallet's user go to Home menu and list receive transactions.
steps.name: incoming intra user

name: Send Payment Request to Intra user
desc: A Wallet's Intra User sends a payment request to another intra user contact to request payment for a specific amount.

steps.title: Select Intra User contact and submit payment request
steps.desc: The customer selects a contact from the list and submits the payment request.

steps.title: Route Send to Outgoing Intra Actor Plugin
steps.desc: The module routes this crypto send to the Outgoing Intra Actor Plugin to send the actor selected.
steps.name: crypto wallet

steps.title: Send metadata to network service
steps.desc: The Outgoing Intra Actor plugin routes the send metadata to the network service to send payment information to actor selected.

steps.title: Call the intra user to deliver the payment request
steps.desc: The network service places a call to the intra user and then it delivers the payment request via the Fermat network.
steps.name: crypto payment request

steps.title: Transport request
steps.desc: The payment request is transported through the communication layer and one of the available channels.

steps.title: Receive the payment request
steps.desc: The network service receives the payment request and informs that to Request Crypto Payment Plugin.
steps.name: crypto payment request

steps.title: Records the request
steps.desc: The payment request is saved with the type received and associated to intra user actor .
steps.name: crypto payment

steps.title: Return payment request list
steps.desc: The module returns the payement request receive list.
steps.name: crypto wallet

steps.title: List Received Payment Request
steps.desc: The wallet's user go to Payment Request menu and list payment request receive.

name: Refuse Payment Request from Intra user
desc: A Wallet's Intra User refuse a payment request sent by another actor.

steps.title: Select payment request record to refuse
steps.desc: The actor selects a payment request from the list and press deny button.

steps.title: Route request to payment request plugin
steps.desc: The module routes this payment request refuse to the Crypto Payment Request Plugin to reach the selected intra user.
steps.name: crypto wallet

steps.title: Route refuse to network service
steps.desc: The module routes this refuse to the network service to reach the selected intra user.

steps.title: Call the intra user to deliver the refuse
steps.desc: The network service places a call to the intra user and then it delivers the refuse via the Fermat network.
steps.name: crypto payment request

steps.title: Transport request
steps.desc: The payment request is transported through the communication layer and one of the available channels.

steps.title: Receive the payment request
steps.desc: The network service receives the refuse and informs that to Request Crypto Payment Plugin.
steps.name: crypto payment request

steps.title: Update the request status
steps.desc: The payment request is update with the status deny.
steps.name: crypto payment

steps.title: Return payment request send list
steps.desc: The module returns the payement request send list.
steps.name: crypto wallet

steps.title: List Send Payment Request
steps.desc: The wallet's user go to Payment Request menu and list payment request send, and show this status.

name: Accept  Payment Request From Intra user
desc: A Wallet's Intra User accept a payment request sent by another actor.

steps.title: Select payment request receive and accept it
steps.desc: The customer selects a payment request from the receive list and press accept button.

steps.title: Route request acceptance to plugin
steps.desc: The module routes this acceptance to the Crypto Payment Request Plugin to apply the payment to the intra user actor.
steps.name: crypto wallet

steps.title: Route acceptance to network service
steps.desc: The Crypto Payment Request Plugin routes this acceptance to the network service to inform the actor intra user about payment acceptance.

steps.title: Route acceptance to Outgoing Intra User
steps.desc: The Crypto Payment Request Plugin notifies the outgoing intra user plugin to generate the send crypto transaction. And continuous workflow of sending btc an intra user actor

steps.title: Call the intra user to deliver the acceptance message
steps.desc: The network service places a call to the intra user and then it delivers the message via the Fermat network.
steps.name: crypto payment request

steps.title: Transport request
steps.desc: The acceptance message is transported through the communication layer and one of the available channels.

steps.title: Receive the acceptance notification
steps.desc: The network service receives the acceptance notification and informs that to Request Crypto Payment Plugin.
steps.name: crypto payment request

steps.title: Update the Payment request
steps.desc: The payment request is updated  with the Request Action in state INFORM_APPROVAL .
steps.name: crypto payment

name: Creates an Intra Wallet User
desc: Creates an Intra Wallet User Identity.

steps.title: Open the wallet to create a new Identity
steps.desc: The user open the Wallet User Identity and proceed to fill the requested data inside the form and press the save button.

steps.title: Process Intra User Identity creation request
steps.desc: The module routes the data containing the name and profile picture to the  IntraWalletUserModule plugin.

steps.title: Process Intra User Identity creation request
steps.desc: The module routes the name and profile picture to the  IntraWalletIdentityPluginRoot  plugin.

steps.title: Process Intra User Identity creation request
steps.desc: Within this plugin, two different keys are created, a public one and a private one, after that the plugin routes the data to the IntraWalletUserIdentityDao.

steps.title: Creates the Intra User Identity
steps.desc: The dao  inserts the data in the DB.

steps.title: Start
steps.desc: The user opens the Intra Wallet Community and the fragment proceeds to initialize all required components.

steps.title: Processing the requested list

steps.desc: The ws gets the connected list of components and send it back to the ns

steps.title: Getting the list of connected users.

desc: List all connected users.

steps.title: Start
steps.desc: The user opens the Community Connections and the fragment proceeds to initialize all required components.

steps.title: Processing the requested list
steps.desc: The module routes the requested list to the IntraWalletUser plugin.

steps.title: Routing the requested list.
steps.desc: The plugin routes the request to the IntraWalletUserDao.

steps.title: Processing the list

steps.title: Getting the list of connected users.

name: Open Intra Wallet Community Requested Connections
desc: List all users pending for acceptance.

steps.title: Start
steps.desc: The user opens the Community Request Connections and the fragment proceeds to initialize all required components.

steps.title: Processing the requested list of users pending for acceptance.
steps.desc: The module routes the requested list to the IntraWalletUserActor plugin.

steps.title: Routing the requested list.
steps.desc: The plugin routes the request to the IntraWalletUserDao.

steps.title: Processing the list
steps.desc: The list is retrived from the DB and send back to the plugin.

steps.title: Getting the list of connected users.
steps.desc: The plugin send the request back to the module.

steps.title: Sends the list back to the view
steps.desc: The module routes the requested list to the fragment.

steps.title: Display the list of users.
steps.desc: The fragment displays the list of users pending for acceptance.

name: Add Intra User Actor as a Wallet Contact
desc: A Wallet's User sends a payment to an intra user is not your wallet contact.

steps.title: Select Send btc options.
steps.desc: The wallet user selects Send btc options and write contact name in in the sending form, then select a intra user connection

steps.title: Convert connection as wallet contact
steps.desc: The module create a new contact through the Wallet Contact Middleware and send crypto address request for network services.

steps.title: Call the intra user to deliver the address request

steps.name: crypto addresses

steps.title: Transport request
steps.desc: The address request is transported through the communication layer and one of the available channels.

steps.title: Receive the address request
steps.desc: The network service receives the address request and informs that to Crypto Addresses Middleware.
steps.name: crypto addresses

steps.title: Get the address of intra user
steps.desc: Crypto Addresses Middleware gets a new address through the Crypto Address Manager and the return to Crypto Address Network Services.

steps.title: Call the Wallet Contacts middleware to deliver the intra user address
steps.desc: The network service places a call to the Wallet Contacts middleware and then it delivers the crypto address via the Fermat network.
steps.name: crypto addresses

steps.title: Transport request
steps.desc: The crypto address is transported through the communication layer and one of the available channels.

steps.title: Update wallet contact crypto address
steps.desc: The crypto address network services returns the address of the contact, which is updated in the database .

steps.title: List wallets contacts
steps.desc: The wallet's user will contact list and select the new contact to view his address.
